section.name: Create UserService
section.p: This page provides directions to create the UserService using MagicDraw 15.5.
We will create UserService in a package named org.andromda.timetracker.service.

ol.li: In the timetracker model create a package called service under org.andromda.timetracker.

In the Containment Tree on the left, right-click on the service package and select New Diagram > Class Diagram. The diagram is created and opened in a new window. Type in Services as the name of this diagram and press Enter.
Add a new class to the diagram and name it UserService.
Add the stereotype called Service to UserService.

Let's add the getAllUsers() method to UserService. Right-click on the UserService class and selectInsert New Operation. A new operation is inserted with the specification +unnamed1(). Write over this specification with this new one: +getAllUsers(). Do not specify the return value right now because MagicDraw gets confused with the UserVO[] syntax. After typing the operation click outside the class exit the edit mode.
Now double-click the operation to open the Operation Specification dialog box.
Choose UserVO[] in the Return Type drop-down and then clickOK.
Make sure your class diagram matches the one shown on the right.
Make sure that the MagicDraw containment tree matches the screen shot shown below.
Save your timetracker model by selectingFile > Save Project.
Export it in EMF/UML2 format by selectingFile > Export > EMF UML2 XMI. Choose C:/timetracker/mda/src/main/uml as export directory and clickOpen.

section.p: We are now ready to generate code for the UserService. Please go back to the main tutorial page and continue from where you left off.
